column1: Uchi////-The Pitchfork: One of my favorite rolls on the menu (though I highly recommend the Biendo as well as the Ham and Eggs roll) the Pitchfork consists of the tastiest
column2: most flavorful wagyu beef I have ever tried
column4: salty leek confetti shavings for a sharp green flavor
column5: and melded together with creamy avocado... Oh
